short_summary: Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services
description: Project management services to support the Royal Canadian Air Force's Air Force Expeditionary Capacity program projects
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Internde and Senior Project Managers

## Table of Contents
- [Tender Details](#tender-details)
- [Notice Information](#notice-information)
- [Description of Requirement](#description-of-requirement)
- [Pre-qualified Suppliers](#pre-qualified-suppliers)
- [Security Requirements](#security-requirements)

## Tender Details

- **Reference Number:** PW-23-01025207
- **Amendment Number:** 1
- **Solicitation Number:** W8475-TSPS2023-12/A
- **Publication Date:** 2023-02-08
- **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-03-06T14:00:00 EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 10 March 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 28 February 2026

## Notice Information
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPA), and others

## Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defence requires the services of two Project Managers:

* Senior Project Manager (Level 3)
* Intermediate Project Manager (Level 2)

These services are required to support the Royal Canadian Air Force's Air Force Expeditionary Capacity program projects.

## Pre-qualified Suppliers
This tender is open to the pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) arrangement. The list of pre-qualified suppliers can be found on the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) website.

## Security Requirements
- **Security Clearance Required:** FSC - Secret
- **Security Level Required:** None (Document Safeguarding)
- **Security Vetting:** Completed in accordance with all relevant regulations

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Emérance Nyirahakizimana
* **Email:** [Emerance.Nyirahakizimana@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Emerance.Nyirahakizimana@forces.gc.ca)
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Z4

Note: This rewritten text has been formatted to be more concise and easy to understand. The technical writing style has been adjusted to be more professional and suitable for a government tender
